SELECT o.orderNumber,o.orderTime,o.payTime,s.userName,o.orderPrice/100 orderPrice,o.platform,o.orderStatus,o.confirmOrder,o.payCode,ad.address address ,ss.`name` supervisorName FROM t_virtual_order o LEFT JOIN sys_user s ON o.userId=s.userId LEFT JOIN t_address ad ON ad.`addrId`=o.`addressId` LEFT JOIN t_user_store tus ON tus.userId=o.userId LEFT JOIN t_store st ON st.storeId = tus.storeId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor ss ON ss.supervisorNum=st.supervisorId WHERE 1=1 and o.`status`=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND o.platform=#{relationMap.platform}
AND o.orderStatus=#{relationMap.orderStatus}
AND ( o.orderNumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.orderNumber}),'%') OR s.userName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.orderNumber}),'%') )
AND ad.address LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.address}),'%')
AND ss.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.supervisorName}),'%')
AND o.payCode IN ('WX','ZFB')
AND o.payCode = #{relationMap.payCode}
order by o.orderTime DESC
